name: Port Blair (South Andaman)
notes: Main entry point; also base for Baratang day trips and Wandoor (Jolly Buoy / Red Skin).

name: Havelock (Swaraj Dweep)
notes: Major tourist island; top beaches, scuba diving and kayaking.

name: Neil (Shaheed Dweep)
notes: Compact, flat island ideal for relaxed stays and cycling.

name: Long Island
notes: Remote island village; access for Lalaji Bay, Merk Bay and Guitar Island.

name: Baratang (Middle Andaman)
notes: Stop on the ATR famous for Limestone Caves, Mud Volcano and mangrove creeks.

name: Rangat (Middle Andaman)
notes: Middle Andaman hub; Dhani Nallah walkway, Amkunj, Morrice Dera and Yerrata Mangroves.

name: Mayabunder (Middle Andaman)
notes: Base for Karmatang Beach, Avis Island, Interview Island and Austin Strait viewpoints.

name: Diglipur (North Andaman)
notes: Northern hub for Ross & Smith, Saddle Peak trek, Kalipur and Ramnagar beaches.

name: Little Andaman (Hut Bay)
notes: Surfing and waterfalls; Butler Bay, White Surf and Whisper Wave.

name: Remote / Expeditions
notes: Barren Island, Cinque, Inglis and other charter-only or permit-heavy day expeditions.
